#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<list>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#define x getchar_unlocked()
#define y putchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
inline void inp(int &n ) {//fast input function
	n=0;
	int ch=x,sign=1;
	while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=x;}
	while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
 		n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+ ch-'0', ch=x;
	n=n*sign;
	}

int R[100000],n,t,ans;

int main() {
	inp(t);
	while(t--) {
		set<int> s;
		set<int>::iterator it;
		inp(n);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			inp(R[i]);
			R[i]=-R[i];
			}
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			//if(s.find(R[i])!=s.end())
			//	continue;
			s.insert(R[i]);
			it=s.find(R[i]);
			it++;
			if(it!=s.end())
				s.erase(it);
			}
		ans=s.size();
		cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
	return 0;
	}
